location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas White, Paymaster General, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Extract of a letter, dated 20 February 1812 from the Military Paymaster General to Bruce, requesting compliance with the instructions conveyed in his letter of 3 October 1811.The letter from 3 October 1811 requests documents in relation to disbursements. Its entry in the index is dated as 3 August 1811, instead of 3 October.
